nodes.text: Warton was a former colonist from the volcanic planet of Eol Sha. He led Luke to Gantoris for his new Jedi Academy. He along with the other colonists were relocated to the planet Dantooine in 11 ABY. He, his wife, and his fellow evacuees were killed when Admiral Daala razed the fledgling group. His death was one of the many that sparked the Jedi apprentice Gantoris's fall to the dark side and death.
